text:
On a Zoom a colleague was giddy, as he'd just rec'ed his 2nd #COVID19 #vaccine dose & is planning a month-long journey X-India.
We all need to find a proper balance betwn vaccine euphoria & continued safety, for ourselves & others. I'm not ready for "India". But I am vax-happy. https://t.co/V8lYxiEPvV
